full_text: FORM G-325A OMB No. 1115-0066 U.S. Department of Justice BIOGRAPHIC INFORMATION Approval expires 4-30-85 Immigration and Naturalization Service BIRTHDATE(Mo.-Day-Yr.) (Include all information requested above.) DATE THIS FORM IS SUBMITTED IN CONNECTION WITH APPLICATION FOR: SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT Vanueler Roment NATURALIZATION 08-19-87 MOTHER (SPECIFY): Political Asylum IF YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET IS IN OTHER THAN ROMAN LETTERS WRITE YOUR NAME IN YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET IN THIS SPACE Are all copies legible? Yes PENALTIES: SEVERE PENALTIES ARE PROVIDED BY LAW FOR KNOWINGLY AND WILLFULLY FALSIFYING OR CONCEALING A MATERIAL FACT. BE SURE TO PUT YOUR NAME AND ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER IN APPLICANT: THE BOX OUTLINED BY HEAVY BORDER BELOW.
